altername_name: Sesame Street: Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure: The Videogame
name: 123 Sesame Street: Elmo's A-to-Zoo Adventure: The Videogame
overview: JOIN ELMO AND ZOE ON AN ALPHABET ADVENTURE! - Learning can be fun with the help of Sesame Street characters! - Fosters literacy skills, including letter identification, letter sounds, and word families. - Features easy to follow audio-visual directions - Use a second Wii Remote to drop-in and assist when needed. - Game difficulty adapts to your child's level.
